actions.text: Amendment SA 651 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 51.

Amendment SA 651 proposed by Senator Rubio. (consideration: CR S459; text: CR S459) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to catch-and-release policies and the Migrant Protection Protocols.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 651 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 51.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 651 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 51.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 651 proposed by Senator Rubio.

purpose: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to catch-and-release policies and the Migrant Protection Protocols.
